desc: Kingjoy has manufactured photographic equipment since 2004, making photography support to famous companies, like GoPro, Sony, Nikon, Gittos, B&H, Hama, Adorama, to name just a few. Kingjoy aims at meeting the needs of demanding photographers and filmmakers worldwide, designing tripods, heads, ring lights and so on.

layout.text: C86M Camouflage Carbon Fiber Tripod-C86 Upgraded
